## R Markdown


```{r ex1}
library(jDirichletMixtureModels)
library(ggplot2)

dmm.setup()

model <- dmm.model()

Xdata <- data(syntheticGaussian1)

states <- dmm.cluster(model, Xdata)
dmm.plot(states[[1]]$labeledData)
```
